特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: This course introduces the basic principles of microeconomics that are fundamentally important to manage scarce resources at the individual to firm level. We aim to understand how people make decisions, how firms behave in the market, and how labor markets work. We also consider the limits and appropriate policy interventions related to microeconomic issues.
授業方法: Students will receive the required readings one week before and the lecture notes after each session. Online students can access the on-demand lecture videos of classes created separately by the instructor.
